summary: Create an app/website experience that includes a main-screen dropdown for selecting dance styles, supports uploading a photo to the website, and applies a dance-themed background blending Bollywood and Bharatanatyam (classical) aesthetics.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dance-themed wide background illustration blending Bollywood dance energy (cinema/glamour-inspired motifs, dynamic silhouettes) with Bharatanatyam classical aesthetics (temple/kolam-inspired ornamentation, classical pose silhouette), warm saffron/terracotta palette, subtle and low-contrast (dance-background.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Add a dropdown input on the appâ€™s main screen that lets the user select a dance style from: "Bollywood", "Classical", "Semi-classical", and "Indo Fusion". Display a clear label above the dropdown in English (e.g., "Dance style") and show the currently selected value on the screen (e.g., as helper text below the dropdown).

Apply a coherent, creative visual theme for the main screen (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently for the dropdown section without introducing new product features.

Add a photo upload UI on the main screen that lets the user choose an image file, preview it before uploading, upload it to the backend, and show upload success/error states using English user-facing text.

Display previously uploaded photos in the UI by loading the photo list from the backend and rendering a simple gallery/list with thumbnails; allow viewing a larger preview of a selected uploaded photo.

Add a dance-themed background to the main page that visually includes both Bollywood-themed elements and Bharatanatyam (classical) themed elements, and apply it behind the existing content without changing existing product functionality.
Add the generated background image(s) as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the app styling (do not route background images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a dropdown input on the main screen with dance styles (Bollywood, Classical, Semi-classical, Indo Fusion).
Add functionality to upload a photo to the website.

Implement backend support for uploading and retrieving photos by adding Motoko actor methods to store photo bytes and metadata, return a stable photo id on upload, and allow listing and fetching uploaded photos for display in the UI.
Modify the webpage to use a dance-themed background that includes both Bollywood-themed and Bharatanatyam classical-themed elements.

projectName: Add dance style dropdown on main screen
